mapper.select: SELECT e.enrollment_id AS enrollmentId, co.name AS courseName, u.name AS teacherName, co.current_count AS currentCount, co.max_capacity AS maxCapacity FROM tbl_enrollment e JOIN tbl_course co ON e.course_id = co.course_id JOIN tbl_teacher_detail td ON co.teacher_detail_id = td.teacher_detail_id JOIN tbl_user u ON td.user_id = u.user_id WHERE e.student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY e.created_at DESC
